data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhong, Yang, Jäger, Peter, Chen, Jian, Liu, Jie (2019): Taxonomic study of Sinopoda spiders from China (Araneae: Sparassidae). Zootaxa 4607 (1): 1-81, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4607.1.1|108 occurrences
